Position / Title
:
Molding Foreman / Team Lead
Duties & Responsibilities:
Perform a variety of duties and responsibilities as Molding Foreman /
Team lead for  mixing materials, assembling mold parts, filling molds, and stacking
molds to molds and cast a wide range of products.
Supervised production schedules, production quality and on time delivery.
Reviewed production orders, schedules, delivery dates and inventory levels to
determine product availability.
Trained, developed and counseled employees to develop a high performing team.
Developed and maintained strong and clear communication and rapport with plant
personnel.
Maintained and enforced a safe and clean working environment at all times.
Supervises adherence to ISO requirements.
Responsible for the maintenance, care and technical knowledge of all presses and
related equipment involved in the process.
sections.ACTIVITIES:
Supervise a 24 hour operation.
Orders raw materials, supplies, equipment and tooling necessary for production
molding.
Prepare/submit daily, weekly and monthly progress reports to Production Manager.
Check all the patterns and machines prior to instruct the manpower.
Conduct inspection and verification of raw materials needed daily to attain the
monthly target production of my section.
Ensures efficient work flow thru improvements and modification in production
operation.
Authorized Forklift Operator for a 1 to 6 tons machine and Skid Loader Operator.
Execute solution of various molding defects encountered.
